Title: Model T Housing

Title: Eggtastic Fortress
Description:
It began, as many thought exercises do, with a discussion in the
          kitchen. My wife and I were debating whether a cooked egg was still
          safe to eat after spending the night on the kitchen counter. I am 
          certainly not the type to throw away food lightly at the lightest hint 
          of an issue. Confidently, I told her the egg would be fine. After all, 
          eggshells are made of calcium carbonate, solid, sealed, and, 
          in my mind, impenetrable to any contaminants.
